en_question:
A commercial company plans to open 5 new stores and has decided to assign the construction of these stores to 5 construction companies. The construction cost quotations (in thousand yuan) from construction company $A_i$ (for i = 1, 2, \cdots, 5) to build store $B_j$ (for j = 1, 2, \cdots, 5) are shown in Table 5-10.To minimize the total construction cost(in thousand yuan), how should the company assign the construction tasks among the 5 construction companies?

\begin{table}[h]
    \centering
    \caption{Table 5-10: Construction Cost Quotations (in thousand yuan)}
    \renewcommand{\arraystretch}{1.2}
    \begin{tabular}{c|ccccc}
        \toprule
        $c_{ij}$ & $B_1$ & $B_2$ & $B_3$ & $B_4$ & $B_5$ \\
        \midrule
        $A_1$ & 4 & 8 & 7 & 15 & 12 \\
        $A_2$ & 7 & 9 & 17 & 14 & 10 \\
        $A_3$ & 6 & 9 & 12 & 8 & 7 \\
        $A_4$ & 6 & 7 & 14 & 6 & 10 \\
        $A_5$ & 6 & 9 & 12 & 10 & 6 \\
        \bottomrule
    \end{tabular}
\end{table}
cn_question:
某商业公司计划开办 5 家新商店，决定由 5 家建筑公司分别承建。已知建筑公司 $A_i (i=1,2,\cdots,5)$ 对新商店 $B_j (j=1,2,\cdots,5)$ 的建造费用的报价（万元）为 $c_{ij}$，见表 5-10。为了节省费用，商业公司应当对 5 家建筑公司怎样分配建造任务，才能使总的建造费用最少？

\begin{table}[h]
    \centering
    \caption{建筑公司对新商店的建造费用报价（表 5-10）}
    \renewcommand{\arraystretch}{1.2}
    \begin{tabular}{c|ccccc}
        \toprule
        $c_{ij}$ & $B_1$ & $B_2$ & $B_3$ & $B_4$ & $B_5$ \\
        \midrule
        $A_1$ & 4 & 8 & 7 & 15 & 12 \\
        $A_2$ & 7 & 9 & 17 & 14 & 10 \\
        $A_3$ & 6 & 9 & 12 & 8 & 7 \\
        $A_4$ & 6 & 7 & 14 & 6 & 10 \\
        $A_5$ & 6 & 9 & 12 & 10 & 6 \\
        \bottomrule
    \end{tabular}
\end{table}
